rules.ruleString: For COURSE_CODE IN {3387, L6005} Do Must have passed 72 credit points Otherwise true
Must be enrolled in course type {04, 05, 06, 06G, 06PG, 07G, 07PG, 42} owned by {50000567}

unitName: International refugee law and human rights
description: This unit examines the human rights implications of principles and practices of international refugee protection.  It examines the evolution of the international regime for refugee protection and compares application of key concepts and practices of refugee protection, amongst receiving states, including the EU. . It examines the human rights implications of asylum and non-refoulement, the refugee definition, and its elements.  It analyses regional responses to refugee crises.
